thread.title: Daredevil Villain Vincent D'Onofrio Will Rule Oz on NBC
thread.title_full: Daredevil Villain Vincent D'Onofrio Will Rule Oz on NBC

title: Daredevil Villain Vincent D'Onofrio Will Rule Oz on NBC
text: Daredevil Villain Vincent D'Onofrio Will Rule Oz on NBC Thursday, 22 October 2015 (8 minutes ago) The Marvel's Daredevil actor has been cast as the Wizard of Oz in Emerald City, NBC's 10-episode imagining of L. Frank Baum's beloved 14-book series, TVLine reports. Emerald City offers a dark spin on the classic tale, following what happens when 20-year-old Dorothy Gale lands in Oz, where the all-powerful Wizard has outlawed magic, deadly warriors prowl, and wicked witches are free to plot their mischief.
